info.title: Market Research Library API
info.description: The Market Research Library API provides metadata for country and industry reports that are produced by ITA's trade experts and are available in ITA's online market research library. ITA commercial officers that are stationed around the world, publish these authoritative reports in conjunction with Foreign Service officers from the State Department.

get.description: The Market Research Library API provides metadata for country and industry reports that are produced by ITA's trade experts and are available in ITA's online market research library. ITA commercial officers that are stationed around the world, publish these authoritative reports in conjunction with Foreign Service officers from the State Department.

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: Returns market research reports for a match in the description or title fields.

parameters.name: countries
parameters.description: Returns market research reports for a specific country based on ISO alpha-2 country codes. Enter multiple terms by separating with a comma.

parameters.name: industries
parameters.description: Returns market research reports for specific controlled industry terms. Enter multiple terms by separating with a comma.

parameters.name: expiration_date
parameters.description: Returns entries based on their expiration date. Dates are filtered by comparing them against an inclusive range, which must be entered with the following format YYYY-mm-dd TO YYYY-mm-dd. Searching on a single date can be done by entering the same value for the start and end of the range.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The size parameter allows you to configure the number of results to be returned up to a maximum of 100. Note: To download the entire Market Research Library in one call set size=-1

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The offset parameter defines the offset from the first result you want to fetch. Unless specified the API returns 10 results at a time.

id.description: Unique identifier assigned to the report.

country.description: Country category(ies) assigned to the report.

expiration_date.description: Date when the report is no longer valid.

source_industry.description: The industries associated with the report.

industry.description: Industry categories assigned to the report.

report_type.description: The report type can either be CCG, Best Market Report, or Market Research Report.
